name: VUB IB Redesign fix
description:
Tento styl sa pokusa opravit vzhlad redesignovaneho internet bankingu VUB banky, na zaciatok aspon prehlad pohybov na ucte odstranenim bocneho menu a rozsirenim a sprehladnenim tabulky pohybov. Navrat do dashboardu mozny cez tlacidlo Spat v spodnej casti stranky.
 
This script attempts to fix the look of redesigned internet banking of Slovak VUB bank, initially at least account movements view.
